reviews.comments: El dpto esta muy bien ubicado, es muy lindo y muy limpio. Muy recomendable! Gracias Fernando
Buena opción, con buena ubicación.
Un lugar perfecto para una pareja

El lugar es tal cual como se ve en las fotos. Súper cómodo y cerca de todo. El barrio precioso. Fernando es muy amable y esta a disposición en todo momento.
Más que recomendable.

El apartamento es divino, muy bien organizado, limpio y completo con tv a cable, wi-fi y aire. 
En la sala tiene un hermoso balcón. 
Tiene una buena cocina toda equipada y iluminada. 
La habitación es confortable y completa con sabanas y acolchado.
El baño tiene toallas limpias y la ducha caliente.
El edificio tiene laundry.
Su ubicación es excelente, a pocas cuadras del subte y colectivos, acerca tienes supermercados y panaderías.
Es un barrio muy tranquilo con muchas opciones para salir... restaurantes, cafés, bares, boliches.
Santiago y tu familia son muy buenos anfitriones y ayudaran en todo que necesité.
Gracias por la increíble hospedaje.

Las fotos del departamento no le hacen justicia al lugar
Es cómodo, no tanto en dimensión pero cada detalle es evidentemente estudiado y de muy buen gusto 
Hemos tenido desayunos en el balcón con copas de árboles al lado, delicioso 

La vecindad, increíble, una fiesta permanente con todo en la puerta

Y lo mejor: la relación con Fernando excelente y el encargado Lorenzo,
Lorenzo merece un capítulo aparte, hará lo que necesite para que todo este bien, y lo mejor
Lo logra, aun para cebar un mate, que he tomado con el

Sin duda volveré, y me dará gusto estar acá 

David

Apartamento ubicado en una zona muy agradable y completa de Buenos Aires. Si decides movilizarte en bus a unos cuantos pasos está una de las paradas, igualmente si la elección es el metro, la estación más cercana está a 9 minutos caminando. Es un sector seguro, donde hay una gran variedad de restaurantes.

Excelente opción. Fernando fue muy atento, junto con Lorenzo, quien incluso nos espero a altas horas de la noche y siempre atentos a nuestras solicitudes. El departamento está perfecto, limpio y muy bien ubicado. 100% recomendado.
100% recomendable! Súper cómodo y ubicado en una zona bonita, segura, con vida nocturna cercana pero al mismo tiempo muy tranquilo.
El departamento es genial y en una muy buena zona,  es grande y con buen espacio justamente como aparece en las fotos Fernando es un gran host.
Muy buena ubicación, cerca de todo: restaurantes, transporte, comercio. Zona muy tranquila y segura. Las fotos son 100% confiables. linda ciudad, buen destino!!! Gracias Fernando.

Todo bien con el alojamiento. Las fotos muestran el apartamento perfectamente.

El dueño muy atento, los problemas se solucionaron con rapidez.

Espero volver en un futuro.
Me relacione con Lorenzo y estuvo muy atento. La descripcion del departamento es tal cual. Zona segura y lrepleta de lugares de esparcimiento y comidas. Me senti como en casa.

Fernando es el mejor! No habíamos bajado del taxi y ya estaba a nuestro lado dándonos la bienvenida y ayudándonos con las maletas. El loft es muchísimo mejor de lo bien que ya se ve en las fotos. Me quede con una amiga y el espacio resultó perfecto: la distribución, los equipos y artefactos, el balcón, presión de agua, la cama, A/C y calefacción... ¡todo!
La energía que se sentimos fue genial, muy relajado. El barrio es muy seguro, bien ubicado, con muchos comercios alrededor, una oferta de bares y restaurantes muy variada y lo suficientemente apacible por las noches que garantizaba un descanso perfecto.
Está muy cerca a la Av. Santa Fe y Juan B. Busto, ambas te permiten acceder por transporte público a cualquier parte de la ciudad.
El loft fue tan cómodo que pudimos preparar algunas comidas y sentirnos muy cómodas como para pasar algunas tardes tranquilas conversando en el living.
La comunicación con Fernando siempre fluida, las instrucciones súper claras y a la mano, el WiFi una maravilla, no tuvimos ningún incoveniente.
Definitivamente lo recomendamos y pensamos volver pronto.
reviews.response:
Chicas, son las primeras peruanas en visitarme, que mas puedo pedir después de conocerlas, gente maravillosa que solo Airbnb puede conectar a través de esta maravillosa página, que lo mejor que hace es juntar amigos en todo el mundo!
Vuelvan pronto y muchas gracias por visitarnos!!!

reviews.comments:
Quiero agradecer eternamente a Fernando por tener ese espacio tan lleno de paz y luz. Estuve 21 días en su departamento, es mejor que en las fotos mas espacioso y todo listo para que te sientas comodo. La cama comodisima que no puedo acostumbrarme nuevamente a mi cama. Fernando si bien no lo conoci, estuvimos siempre comunicados por (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN). Nunca faltó el agua caliente, ni el internet.
El departamento esta muy bien situado en un barrio tranquilo, a solo algunas cuadras esta toda la movida de Palermo, aun asi el departamento es tranquilo y no hay ruido por lo cual pude descansar. Markets hay por todos lados.
Lorenzo el portero y su esposa Martha muy atentos. Recomiendo mucho el espacio sobre todo a las personas que vienen a descansar a Buenos Aires.
reviews.response: Martin, además de ser una persona súper alegre, deseo agradecer tus comentarios, es por gente como vos que descubro que Air bnb es la unión perfecta para conocer amigos de todo el mundo, hasta pronto y buen regreso s casa Martin!

reviews.comments:
El departamento es mucho mejor de lo que uno observa por las fotos.
Fernando es muy muy amable, hace que uno se sienta cómodo desde que entras al edificio. Esta muy bien equipado, han cuidado todos los detalles para que uno se sienta como en casa y lo mas importante!! Muy Limpio. La ubicación es perfecta cercano a todo restaurantes, teatros, cafeterías, shopping, subte. 
Muchas gracias Fernando por habernos recibido, pasamos una semana increíble !!! Nos vemos pronto!!!
Saludos
Damian - Andrea

La descripción del apto es como lo indican en el anuncio, incluso es mejor de lo que se ve en las fotografías,  es amplio, cómodo, tranquilo y sobre todo muy limpio, todo dentro del mismo funciona a la perfección. Esta ubicado en una excelente zona, muy segura y con muchos restaurantes, bares, supermercados, teatros, etc; todo lo que necesitas, lo encuentras en sus alrededores, otra ventaja de la zona, es el acceso a diferentes medios de transporte (buses, subte  y tren), todos disponibles a unas pocas cuadras. Lo mejor del apto en mi estadía fue, el trato que recibí de parte de los anfitriones,    el padre de Santiago, es una muy buena persona, nos recibió desde el primer día con mucha amabilidad y entusiasmo,  enseguida nos hizo sentir como en casa, siempre estuvo pendiente y nos ayudo en todo momento, lo que necesitamos, todas nuestras consultas fueron respondidas de forma breve. Adicionalmente la persona encargada del edificio, es muy amable y siempre esta dispuesta a ayudarte. Definitivamente lo recomiendo, no dudaría en quedarme de nuevo. Aprovecho para agradecerles, ayudaron a que mi viaje fuera mas agradable. Muchas gracias......!!!!!!!

Un apartamento fantastico - muy comodo, limpio, y bien ubicado en Palermo. Tiene mucho espacio y una cocina bien equipada. Santiago y su padre me ayudaban con cualquiera cosa, muy receptivos y amables!

This is an amazing apartment and Fernando was an amazing host! The apartment is in a great location, clean and was easy to get anywhere in the city. Fernando was very responsive, nice and very helpful! I highly recommend staying here to anyone visiting Buenos Aires

O apartamento é incrível. Muito bem localizado. Tem tudo o que se necessita próximo. O Fernando é uma pessoa extremamente simpática e muito solícita. Não temos nada a reclamar. Recomendo com certeza absoluta. E quando voltarmos a Buenos Aires, com certeza nos hospedaremos com ele.

If you are visiting Buenos Aires, I would highly recommend staying at Fernando's place. It is a beautiful loft that has amazing sunlight, is extremely clean with a wonderful living room and kitchen area, and is in one of the best neighborhoods to find amazing restaurants and bars within walking distance in every direction. Fernando was beyond helpful throughout the trip and made even let us into the house earlier than planned when our flight got in earlier. I would recommend staying here 100%! Thank you again Fernando - your home and hospitality were amazing :)
Fernando’s place is stylish, comfortable, and trendy. 10/10!
reviews.response: Your words are very nice Amelia, you and your boyfriend are special beings, thank you!

reviews.comments:
This apartment is in a great location in Palermo Hollywood with everything within walking distance. 
Fernando is lovely and gave me his (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN) number so he was easy to
Contact when I needed. 

My only issue is the noise level, as I was unable to have a good nights sleep for the entire time there as the neighbours and local bars are very noisy and the apartment is not very soundproof.

Excellent apartment and unbeatable location. Clean, tidy and spacious and a nice balcony to relax. Fernando is an excellent host and you'll be spoilt for choice with great bars and restaurants in palmero. Highly recommend this apartment!
reviews.response: Mil gracias Kylie, muy feliz año y un venturoso y lleno de viajes en el 2018!!!!

reviews.comments: Fernando was waiting for me with the key at the apartment which is always nice. Sometimes you have to go pick up a key here vs there and it's a hassle so thank you Fernando for doing that. Another consideration was Fernando provided soap, water, and soda. It's the little things that matter and I appreciated this. The one thing I forgot about  is the rooftop. I only discovered the rooftop on the last night. It was awesome. Gorgeous view of the city. Thank you for your hospitality Fernando.

Great location and great accommodations.  Really close to everything you can do in the city.  Walking distance to amazing restaurants, shopping and nightlife.  Our flight was leaving late the night we checked out and we were able to stay in the apartment several hours after checkout so we didn't have to walk around with our bags all day.
Absolutely amazing apartment and a lovely stay. Wouldn’t change a thing - thank you Fernando!

Fernando foi muito receptivo (apesar de não termos nos visto, por conta dos horários) e Lorenzo também nos ajudou muito (amigo do Fernando e porteiro do prédio). O apartamento é muito bom e muito bem equipado. A localização é ótima! Palermo é o melhor bairro de Buenos Aires e, próximo ao apto, estão bares e restaurantes excelentes. O transporte público tem fácil acesso do lugar, mas é necessário antes comprar o cartão, porque não aceitam dinheiro na hora. Fica próximo também aos Bosques de Palermo e El Rosedal. Vale a pena ficar no apto do Fernando!
Great place in a  great location. Walkable to everything (food, drink, park, subway). Fernando was wonderful and so quick to respond. I would reccomend over and over again.
Fernando's place is great. A practical apartment with the highlight being the location! Palermo is an awesome place to base your trip in BA.

O apartamento de Fernando é ótimo e de acordo com as fotos. É perto de bares e restaurantes em Palermo Hollywood. Adoramos a estadia, a atenção e a prontidão de Fernando em responder, sempre muito rápido e simpático. Recomendo!
Lindíssimo apartamento localizado em uma rua linda toda arborizada!! Tudo muito limpo e organizado, recomendo a todos! Nos sentimos em casa!

The loft and the bathroom is really small. It's really hard to move around the bed. I'm tall and hit my head on the TV that's on the wall due to the bed being so close. I went their for my birthday.. the tloilet was blocked and it wasn't flushing. Fernando was overseas. He doesn't speak English. He  referred me to his building manager. Building manager refused to get there since he doesn't live there. I had to use my hands without gloves. Had to cancel plans to sort it out. After a number of messages he finally got there late at night. By that time my birthday was already ruined.
reviews.response: Dillon resultó ser una mala persona, el mal uso del baño provocó el taponamiento del wc, no entiendo como al dia de hoy existe gente que no sabe comportarse en una vivienda, debe ser la enseñanza que recibió, seguro que su residencia es un caño debajo de un puente, mal bicho, en cuatro años nunca una persona se comportó de esta manera. Definitivamente para el olvido.

reviews.comments: Fernando's apartment is in an absolutely perfect location with restaurants and shops right outside the door and a lovely neighbourhood all around. The apartment itself is lovely, clean, modern and inviting with everything you could need during your stay. Absolutely recommend this apartment for a stay in Buenos Aires and would definitely return in future! Fantastic!
We had a really great days at Fernando's place. It is beautiful, especially the balcony. Location is excellent and the neighbourhood is lively.

Fernando was an excellent host. He was quick to respond and the building manager Lorenzo was very helpful as well. The apartment is in a great location. Close to plenty of restaurants, shops, and bars. Would recommend!

I have been following Airbnb’s business concept/model since it was founded in 2008. Fernando’s apartment was the first rental I decided to try this share-economy experience for two weeks. Admittedly, it was very smooth and very memorable. I could tell that every item in the apartment was placed with careful thoughtfulness and kind consideration (i.e. umbrella, shopping bags, SUBE Card). Several times, Fernando contacted us to see if we needed anything. In addition, he was very responsive to our concern (we broke one of his coffee mugs!!). Lorenzo (apartment manager?) and us somehow miraculously managed to communicate despite his only Spanish speaking and our only “muy poco poco español”. Thank you - you both “Fernando and Lorenzo” for your nice hospitality!!
The apartment was great and Fernando was quick to communicate.
Muito bom! Comunicação excelente e tudo conforme combinado! Recomendo!

This property is in the premier spot of Buenos Aires. You are literally within walking distance from the best shops and bars in all of the city. We enjoyed everything about this visit. Thanks Fernando

This apartment is a fantastic home base for exploring BA. It has everything you'll need, and Fernando is an excellent host! He is a proactive communicator and responds to questions lightening-fast. Upon our arrival he and a lovely woman (his wife maybe?) took the time to show us around the apartment and answer questions, which made us feel so welcome in a new city.

Also important to note: the location is AMAZING. You are within very short walks to SO many excellent restaurants, bars, and coffee shops in Palermo Hollywood. Longer walks will get you easily to Subte stations, MALBA, the botanic gardens, and other locations in Palermo Soho/Viejo. Catching taxis is a snap on the corner right outside of the building. We always felt very safe walking around the neighborhood, at all hours of the day. 

One potential downside is the noise--  Palermo Hollywood is a vibrant neighborhood, particularly at night. We were not bothered, but if you're sensitive to traffic/city noise bring earplugs or opt for a more tranquil neighborhood.

Overall, fantastic!!
Place was perfect.  Area was exactly what we needed,  filed with restaurants, coffee shops some bars and central to most areas.  Can't recommend this place enough

Fernando's place was amazing, even better than I expected. It had a phenomenal balcony and I love the neighborhood. I would highly recommend booking there and would definitely stay there next time I visit.
Gostei muito da localização do apartamento. Próximo a bares, restaurantes e cantinas ótimas. Incrível a facilidade de locomoção tanto de taxi quanto de ônibus (coletivo).

O apartamento eh bem localizado, tem decoração charmosa, é fácil de usar.
E o Fernando é extremamente gentil e simpático . Foi super agradável no check in e nos prestou todas as informações necessárias .
Gostei do apartamento e do atendimento. Se possível retornarei .
O Almacen de Pizzas é uma alternativa interessante para o café da manhã . E fica bem em frente. Serve deliciosas medialunas.
E a pizza e as empanadas podem resolver vem tanto almoço quanto jantar.
Mas a região é uma festa para quem gosta de comer e beber bem
Localização excelente se você não quer visitar o centro. Bons restaurantes perros. Apartamento bem (URL HIDDEN) tudo! Cama boa.

O apartamento é muito bom, exatamente como nas fotos. Além de ser super aconchegante, conseguiu atender todas as nossas necessidades durante a estadia. O Fernando é um ótimo anfitrião, nos recebeu super bem e se mostrou sempre à disposição para quando precisássemos. 
O bairro também é ótimo, próximo à mercados, cafés e restaurantes. E é muito bonito também, vale dar uma volta na vizinhança! 
Foi uma ótima experiência em todos os aspectos, estamos apaixonados por Buenos Aires, e já estamos programando a próxima visita!

Great place in a Funky neighborhood.  We loved the cute and stylish apartment as well as walking (staggering) distance to cafés, restaurants and bars. 
Only negative is that it can be a little noisy from outside, so if you are a light sleeper, bring ear plugs. 
Very happy with the host Fernando, he was there to greet us and show us around the apartment. Very helpfull with questions we had about BA.

Fernando's place was perfect for our stay in Bueno Aires.  Palermo is a very good area to be in too. An open plan apartment on two floors with balacony, it had everything we needed. Fernando was there to meet us and gave us lots of information. The apartment is about ten minutes walk from the metro and there are lots of taxis in the area. He also told us to 'phone him if we needed any help. An excellent way to start our trip in Argentina.

Fernando's apartment is wonderfully located. It's in the middle of the Palermo area and although the apartment is close to Fitz Roy, wich is a rather busy street, there was barely any traffic noice. The little terrace is wonderful for your morning coffee, and even though it's small place, because of the loft design it feels spacious. I would certainly come back!
Fernando is a very kind host with perfect communication and the place is clean and perfect to live in. We would always come back! Thank you very much!
Great location! Everything you need is close by and a lovely neighborhood.

Great place! The location is excellent, Palermo Hollywood is a fine neighbourhood, with many nice restaurants and bars, easy access to the subway and cabs, and close to many other interesting parts of the city.

Very nice 1bwdroom loft style apartment. Location was great for restaurants and public transportation. The apartment is very clean and accommodated all our needs. The apartment building was also very secure.

Nossa estadia foi sensacional!! Adoramos o apartamento do Fernando, muito aconchegante, de acordo com as fotos, bem decorado, e num local maravilhoso que é Palermo. Adoramos a visita do Fernando no nosso último dia em Buenos Aires. Ele é uma pessoa muito simpática, e nos tratou com muita amizade. Grata por tudo Fernando, e vamos voltar logo!! 
Um grande abraço meu e do Ronaldo
Fernando's place is in a great neighbourhood of Palermo with tons of restaurants, cafes, and public transit nearby. The big windows make the space very pleasant with lots of natural light.

Fabulous apartment in a fantastic location. Fernando was the perfect host, meeting us upon arrival and giving us information about the apartment and surrounding area, even leaving a few treats for us in the fridge! Palermo Hollywood is an excellent location, lovely restaurants and bars around the area and easily accessible from the city centre. Highly recommend this apartment to anyone looking for an enjoyable stay in Buenos Aires.
Fernando was a great host. He was on top of everything and place was very accommodating. Great area to enjoy your stay in Buenos Aires :)
Perfect location. Everything was great! Would certainly recommend this place. Thanks Fernando.

O apartamento fica em excelente localização de Palermo Hollywood proximo de mercados, supermercados, restaurantes, bares e a poucos minutos de caminhada do metro de Palermo. Apartamento super agradável com todos os itens que precisam na casa, Fernando inclusive deixou alguns mimos na geladeira para consumirmos. 
Apartamento lindo e identico as fotos, melhor que imaginava ate. Fernando foi sempre atencioso durante nossa estadia.

Fernando é um anfitrião atencioso e gentil. E seu apartamento, além de muito agradável, fica localizado em uma região privilegiada, repleta de bons restaurantes, para todos os gostos. Gostamos bastante, e esperamos retornar.
reviews.response: Muchas gracias Lérida, muy gentil con tus comentarios, como los de todos tus compatriotas que me han visitad, gente muy gentil y amable, viva Brasil!

reviews.comments: The apartment is great, just like the pictures. The area is safe. It was awesome to find this place through airbnb. The host was always on touch and available for any inconvenience. We liked so much that ended up staying for more days.
O local é um charme, uma graça com uma sacada fofa. Adoramos os dias que passamos ali . No dia da chegada Fernando nos aguardou até as 22:30 . Nosso vôo atrasou um pouco . Muito bom !

A localização do loft foi uma grata surpresa. Fica perto de tudo. Supermercados, "tiendas" de frutas e verduras, cafés, bares, restaurantes, brunch e teatros.
Próximo ao metrô, ônibus e taxi.
Tudo no loft é muito confortável e de muita qualidade. As fotos mostram exatamente o que se vai encontrar no lugar.
O proprietário Fernando é muito atencioso e educado. 
Para completar, fomos eu e minha esposa Cintia, numa época com um frio gostoso de 9 graus em média.
Muito bom para uma segunda "Luna de miel".
Adoramos
reviews.response: Me alegra mucho que la hayan pasado bien, son excelentes inquilinos, vuelvan pronto!

reviews.comments: O apartamento de Fernando é maravilhoso, fica em uma localidade ótima e com certeza, fez a diferença na nossa estadia por Buenos Aires. Lorenzo, amigo de Fernando que nos ajudou, foi muito simpático e sempre disponível para tirar nossas dúvidas. Amei tudo e certamente indicarei o apartamento para outros amigos e voltarei assim que puder!
Anfitrião super atencioso! Ótimo apartamento, bairro maravilhoso com tudo perto, milongas, super mercado, padaria, farmácia e o melhor, a estação de metrô, que funciona muito bem!!

This was our best Airbnb experience after 6 weeks in Argentina and 
Chile. The apartment is perfect for 2 people and in a great area close to restaurants, supermarkets, subway and buses. Communication was always very prompt, and Fernando and his wife were very welcoming and helpful.

Sincerily was one the best experiences we'd ever had renting something, the appartment was even better and more beautifull than the pictures, had everything you need for our stay, even a hair dryer! Fernando (Santiago's father), great guy, honest, trustfull and always smiling was waiting for us and gave us a warm welcome including some beverages and chocolates, awsome! We definitly recomend the apartment, great location with the best Pizza spot ever across the street! We will be back to Buenos Aires and no doubt to stay in Santiago's place!

Great apartment in a fun, lively neighborhood. Santiago and his family are excellent hosts and communication was smooth throughout.  Wi-fi is reliable, the apartment is well supplied, and the tri-level roof terrace is a perfect place to relax and enjoy spectacular views over the city of Buenos Aires. Highly recommended!

Santiagos's place was great and had everything we needed for a comfortable stay. It was a perfect size for 2 people. The location was even perfect, just a few blocks from great restaurants, bars and shops. It was very easy to travel around Buenos Aires with the subte or the train close by. The flat was clean and exactly like the pictures. The balcony was perfect to sit and to enjoy the place. I definitely recommend this place! :)
Santiago is a great host. Everything was easy and the apartment is great.

O bairro é ótimo, mas há ruído à noite no apartamento por causa da proximidade de uma parada de ônibus. As acomodações correspondem ao anúncio, só houve uma falha na limpeza do piso e na falta de toalhas, prontamente solucionada.  Não conseguimos usar o telefone.

Santiago hat uns frühzeitig kontaktiert und uns Anweisung gegeben wie wir am besten zu seiner Unterkunft kommen. (per Taxi vom Flughafen für 50 USD). Santiago selber haben wir nicht getroffen aber sein Vater hat uns empfangen und war jederzeit per Whats app erreichbar. Wir sind ihm und seiner Frau sehr dankbar für alle Freundlichkeiten. 
Das Appartement ist genauso und besser als auf den Fotos! Wir haben uns sehr wohl und sicher gefühlt. Die Wohnung ist mit allem Wichtigem ausgestattet. Auch die Lage im Trendquartier Palermo war perfekt. Zahlreiche Restaurants in nächster Umgebung!

Beautiful apartment, beautiful area, great landlord. I will be coming back several times and staying here.

Thank you for everything!

Excellent greeting at the flat.
Beautiful place, perfect location.
Secure, clean, and very big with 2 floors and a terrace!
Good kitchen and amenities.
Lots of blankets if you need them
They even took us to airport when our taxi failed to show up!!
Santiago and his Dad were a great help.

Great location! The apt looks exactly like the pictures.
Nice, safe neighborhood, close to the Subte and plenty of restaurants.

Anfitriões muito amáveis e ao chegarmos tivemos uma boa surpresa já que era duplo aniversário (de casamento e de minha mulher). Recebemos um presente do Sr.Fernando e Patrícia (pais do Santiago). Apto. excelente, muito limpo e com cama muito confortável, um forte sinal de wi-fi e boa localização. Em frente tem uma Cafeteria (Veri Veri) onde tomamos um excelente café todos os dias atendidos por Soledad. Uma das melhores pizzas de BAs. está na esquina, bem como bares, teatros e mercados tudo a poucos metros e próximo do Distrito de Arcos onde se vai caminhando poucas quadras. O Bairro de Palermo é tranquilo, seguro. Recomendo fortemente e quando voltar a BAs. sentirei como em minha casa no Apto. de Santiago. Saludos Sr. Fernando e Patrícia.
The reservation was canceled 30 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The reservation was canceled 35 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The reservation was canceled 6 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
